channel.title: -317- smithing help MAJOR PROBLEM
channel.description:
right now on my server when u use an ore on the furnace it gives u money instead of a bar it would b an easy fix to change it so that it would giv me the bar but then u cant do anything with the bar because wen u use a bar on the anvil nothing happens. i could take the time to learn to code this but it would take me MONTHS and i don't hav the time for that is there any1 that could send me ther smithing section part of their client.java to me?? it would b greatly appreciated!!
THANK YOU SOOOOO MUCH IN ADVANCE I DONT THINK I CAN FIX THIS ON MY OWN

item.title: -317- smithing help MAJOR PROBLEM
item.dc:creator: @albertelli10 albertelli10
item.description:
@albertelli10 wrote:

haha ya thats the way it was wen i downloaded it do you know how to change it so that when u use the ore on the furnace it will giv u the bar and exp?

I’ve literally hav 2 weeks of coding experience haha
the tutorials hav been helpful but they don’t realy adress my specific problems

also ther currently isn’t anything setup so that u can use the bar on an anvil with a hammer and hav the interface popup so that u can choose wat to make with the bars
do you no how to change that??

Read full topic

} if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2351 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 15){ deleteItem(2351, 1); sM("You smith the bar into some gold."); addItem(995, 500); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(800, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2359 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 60){ deleteItem(2359, 1); sM("You smith the bar into some gold."); addItem(995, 1200); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(3500, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2361 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 70){ deleteItem(2361, 1); sM("You smith the bar into some gold."); addItem(995, 2000); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(5000, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2783 && ItemID == 2363 && playerHasItem(2347) && playerLevel[13] >= 85){ deleteItem(2363, 1); sM("You smith the bar into some gold."); addItem(995, 150); setAnimation(898); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(10000, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 436 && playerHasItem(438)){ deleteItem(436, 1); deleteItem(438, 1); addItem(995, 1000); sM("You smith the tin and copper ore and get 1K!."); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(800, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 438 && playerHasItem(436)){ deleteItem(436, 1); deleteItem(438, 1); addItem(995, 1000); sM("You smith the tin and copper ore and get 1k!"); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(800, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 440 && playerLevel[13] >= 15){ deleteItem(440, 1); addItem(995, 5000); sM("You smith the iron ore and get 5k!"); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(1500, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 447 && playerLevel[13] >= 60){ deleteItem(447, 1); addItem(995, 20000); sM("You smith the mithril ore and get 20k!"); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(3500, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 449 && playerLevel[13] >= 70){ deleteItem(449, 1); addItem(995, 75000); sM("You smith the adamant ore and get 75k!"); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(5000, 13); } if(UsedOnObjectID == 2781 && ItemID == 451 && playerLevel[13] >= 85){ deleteItem(451, 1); addItem(995, 150000); sM("You smith the runite ore and get 150k!"); setAnimation(899); faceNPC(UsedOnObjectID); addSkillXP(10000, 13); }

item.title: -317- smithing help MAJOR PROBLEM
item.dc:creator: @albertelli10 albertelli10
item.description:
@albertelli10 wrote:

tyb97:

It does not depend whether or not it is PI or Delta, or any base for that matter, what is happening most likely occurs in what ever class handles your action button pressing, when you click the action button, it gives you money instead of calling your smithing class, so get the action button id when you click to smelt, and search it in that action button class, and you will find the issue.

thats not a problem i see where it specifically says in my client.java file that it says delete the ore and give money so it has nothing to do with the action buttons. thanx for trying tho

i am kindve new at all this coding rsps stuff so im not quite sure whether or not it is a PI or delta but if i remember rite im pretty sure it is a delta

Read full topic

It does not depend whether or not it is PI or Delta, or any base for that matter, what is happening most likely occurs in what ever class handles your action button pressing, when you click the action button, it gives you money instead of calling your smithing class, so get the action button id when you click to smelt, and search it in that action button class, and you will find the issue.
